item.title: Error States
item.description: Notes: Exceptions â€” And Why Odin Will Never Have Them Essential vs Accidental Properties Exception handling I used the term structured exception handling which is different to Microsoft’s SEH, I meant structured in the structured programming sense Structured Exception Handling Microsoft’s SEH Error handling and Go Odin is a multi-valued type system, compared to most languages which have singularly-valued type systems.
